segments.text: I'm in 507 . I have a few problems with my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are cockroaches in my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure , sir ? Flies I could believe , but cockroaches ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've counted nine different cockroaches , and I accidentally stepped on another one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , we run a spotless and cockroach-less hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . Let me transfer you to my supervisor .
segments.speaker: S2
